children.subject: With the exam blackout window starting this upcoming Friday, can we get an extra office hours midweek?  Even though I often can't make the office hours, I always replay them later...especially when prepping for the exams.

history.content:
Hello everyone,

When I selected my usual office hours time slot the choice of 2 PM EST Saturday was a bit arbitrary. I want to pick the Saturday time slot which would allow for most the participation during office hours, so I'm opening a poll for Saturday time slots. Please vote for all time slots you both could and would participate in.

Note: Saturday office hours will not be held next week because of the exam.

[*] 1 PM EST [*] 2 PM EST [*] 3 PM EST [*] 4 PM EST [*] 5 PM EST [*] 6 PM EST [*] 7 PM EST
history.subject: Best Saturday Office Hours Time
